label: Dashboard
body: The dashboard is the main landing page of PhaseII.
You can view news, quick game stats, and play trend data.

label: Game Showcase
body: Cards for the games you've played.
Sorted by last play, click them and you'll go to the game!

label: Dropdown Menu
body: Here you can find all profile settings and customizations.

label: Sidebar
body: Here you can find all other pages in the WebUI.

label: Profile Customization
body: Make PhaseII WebUI V3 your own with UI tweaks!
This will be expanded in the future.

label: Service Integrations
body: Connect your PhaseII account to outside sources for data linking and special features!
Currently, we can link to Kamaitachi and Discord.
